'''Jewelry Soup''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Jewelry Soup is obtainable during the {{Quest|Custodian of Clouds}}.

Depending on the quality, Jewelry Soup increases the party's defense by '''88'''/'''107'''/'''126''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name {{Lang|"Pearl, Jade, White Jade Soup"|zh=珍珠翡翠白玉汤|zh_rm=Zhēnzhū Fěicuì Báiyù Tāng}} refers to the ingredients used in the soup: pearl represents the lotus seeds, jade represents the Snapdragon, and white jade refers to the tofu.
** This is also the name of a soup in real life which contains rice (pearl), cabbage (jade), and tofu (white jade) instead.
